comment: brew day Sep 28, pitched on yeast recovered from fermenter with the Pumpkin Ale, started bubbling within 2 hours; fermentatiion was strong for 4 days; kegged on day 6, Oct 4; FG  1.013; recovered almost 16 oz of yeast stained brown from the porter; tasted damn fine for 6 days (roasty toasty !); primed keg with 3/4 cup corn sugar and bottled 6 16oz flip top bottles; will condition at cellar temp (68F) for 2-3 weeks
